PerfectNetExp.abs: 约氏将人类历史分为三个时代(dispensations)—父上帝时代、子上帝时代和灵上帝时代。他认为父上帝时代开始于亚当，结束于基督， …

list.abs: 英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... compensate v 赔偿；报酬 dispense v 分配，分送 dispensable a 可分配的；不重要的.
词根联想记忆法词汇教程(三)|联想记忆法背单词 ... dispensable adj. 可有可无的 dispense v. 分配，分发 disperse v. 分散，传播.
流体点胶(dispensing)技术广泛用于集成电路封装、微电机系统封装、电子元器
可以考虑用点胶机(dispenser)加点锡膏于Paste-in-Hole的焊垫上来增加锡膏，由于现今的SMT线几乎都已经没有自动点胶机了，所以 …
建筑专业英语词汇(D)|房地产建筑专业英语词汇 ... dismantling furniture 拆卸式家具 dispenser 分配器 dispersing agent 分散剂.

entry.def: A dispensation is special permission to do something that is normally not allowed.

example.ex: A special dispensation may be obtained from the domestic union concerned...
example.tran: 从国内相关的工会那儿或许能得到一项特许。

example.ex: They were promised dispensation from military service...
example.tran: 他们得到许诺，可以免服兵役。

entry.def: Dispensation of something is the issuing of it, especially from a position of authority.

example.ex: ...our application of consistent standards in the dispensation of justice.
example.tran: 我们始终如一的执法标准

entry.tran: （某一特定时期内宗教或政治上的）制度
entry.def: A dispensation is a religious or political system that has authority at a particular time.

example.ex: The new dispensation proved a success, certainly with the business community.
example.tran: 新的制度收到了成效，当然也包括商业界。

auth_sentence.content: This is one of God's great dispensations.
auth_sentence.res_content: This is one of God's great dispensations.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This is one of God's great dispensations.

auth_sentence.content: None of these religious dispensations should be stopped everyone's faith should be respected.
auth_sentence.res_content: None of these religious dispensations should be stopped everyone's faith should be respected.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: None of these religious dispensations should be stopped everyone's faith should be respected.
